Title: How Kamala Harris' style has changed throughout her career
Description: Kamala Harris has been rocking her signature style for decades. It usually includes pantsuits, Converse sneakers, and pearl jewelry.

Title: Kamala Harris wants to expand student-loan forgiveness for 10,000 doctors and nurses who agree to work in rural areas
Description: Vice President Kamala Harris is proposing an expansion of student-loan forgiveness programs to recruit healthcare workers to rural areas in the US.

Title: Harris slams House speaker for suggesting GOP would cut federal semiconductor aid
Description: Kamala Harris is criticizing House Speaker Mike Johnson for suggesting Republicans might cut government subsidies for semiconductor manufacturing

Title: Vice President Harris marks 6 years since Pittsburgh synagogue shooting
Description: In a statement Sunday, Vice President Kamala Harris commemorated six years since the deadly shooting at Pittsburgh's Tree of Life synagogue.

Title: WATCH: Wrong-way driver came within feet of Harris' motorcade, officials say
Description: A suspected drunken driver going the wrong way on the interstate came within feet of Vice President Kamala Harris' motorcade after a campaign stop this week in Wisconsin, a sheriff's official said.

Title: Kamala Harris addresses Biden's "garbage" comment
Description: Vice President Kamala Harris spoke briefly with reporters Wednesday morning about President Biden appearing to call Trump supporters "garbage" when discussing a comedian's joke about Puerto Rico at Sunday's Trump rally. The White House says Mr. Biden was refe…

Title: Harris warns Iran not to respond to Israel's counterstrike
Description: In an interview with CBS News, Vice President Kamala Harris said "it would be a mistake" for Iran to respond to Israel's counterstrike.

Title: Biden lays wreath at the Tomb of the Unknown Soldier to honor Veterans Day

Title: Vice President Harris returns to work after conceding election
Description: With 74 days left in her term, Vice President Kamala Harris returns to the White House following her concession speech at Howard University. CBS News correspondent Willie James Inman has more on Harris's remarks and her final months in office.

Title: Here's how much Kamala Harris is worth — it isn't just from politics
Description: Beyond her decades in politics, the vice president's earnings include book royalties and investments.

Title: Kamala Harris’ press tour was a missed opportunity
Description: The vice president spoke with "60 Minutes," "The View," "Call Her Daddy," Howard Stern and Stephen Colbert. But she didn't say much to swing undecided voters.

Title: Harris’ Fox News interview revealed an ugly double standard in the media
Description: Vice President Kamala Harris is on a media blitz in the final stretch of the presidential campaign.

Title: Harris puts transparency (or lack thereof) in the 2024 spotlight
Description: There can be no doubt that when it comes to transparency, Kamala Harris has a significant advantage over Donald Trump.

Title: Harris sets sights on Rust Belt with 20 days until Election Day

Title: Harris says Trump is a fascist after Kelly's comments go viral

Title: Harris to Michigan, Trump to Georgia as comedian's offensive rally comments go viral

Title: Arizona, Nevada exit polls show Harris leading with Latino voters
Description: Vice President Kamala Harris is leading among Latino voters in Arizona and Nevada, CBS News exit polls suggest. However, Harris is underperforming among the group compared to President Biden's 2020 numbers. CBS News chief political analyst John Dickerson brea…

Title: Harris vows peaceful transfer of power and tells supporters not to give up the fight for opportunity

Title: Harris releases medical records, pressures Trump to follow suit
Description: Vice President Kamala Harris is in "excellent health," according to her physician Saturday in a letter that detailed her medical status. Harris also called on former President Donald Trump to release his medical records. Earlier this year, Trump told CBS News…
